data.text: With a bit of preparation and our useful tips, you can make travelling more fun for the whole family. https://t.co/pGygrfHgLr

urls.title: How to keep the kids happy on a flight?
urls.description: Travelling with children might not be the easiest. The long waits and sitting in one place can take its toll. With a bit of preparation and our useful tips you can make things a bit more fun for the whole family. With smaller kids the key to smooth travel is having lots of options. Whether its toys, games, or snacks keep the children happy by switching things around often enough. Distraction is everything to make the time fly by. Make sure you book a window seat if you have the option to choose. That

data.text:
Start your own perfect road trip from Seattle and head south towards California or north to Canada.
https://t.co/xcD5KyyDaA

urls.title: Seattle is an ideal spot to start your road trip from
urls.description: Finnair's new direct route to Seattle opened a world of adventures. Choose your own perfect road trip and head south towards California or north to Canada. The route from Seattle to Los Angeles - or even all the way to San Diago - spans over three states and 2000 kilometres. In theory you could drive the length in two days, but about 10 days is the minimum if you really want to enjoy the trip. There is easily enough to see for several weeks – in case you are going for a real once in a lifetime experience.

data.text: @NiteshSethiya @DelhiAirport @eutravelrights Hi Nitesh, I'm sorry for the inconvenience! Did you already create a delay report? If not, you can create it here https://t.co/ItZ1e2nmLT. After that, you'll receive a report number and you can follow the status of your bag online via this same link. Kind regards Marika/Finnair

This summer, pent-up travel demand and global labour shortages are causing congestion at many European airports. Read our tips on how to make your trip smoother during the busy travel season. https://t.co/uvTp25Dc8L

urls.title: How to prepare for congestion at airports
urls.description: This summer, pent-up travel demand and global labour shortages are causing congestion at many European airports. At some airports, there have been queues of up to several hours, for example at the security check. Preparation in advance and patience are your best travel companions when you are going on a flight. A smooth travel experience is the sum of many factors. In addition to airline services, your travel path is influenced by many other air traffic operators, such as airports and ground service

urls.title: Ota yhteyttä Finnair Plus -palveluun
urls.description: Alla olevalla lomakkeella voit ottaa yhteyttä, jos Katso myös Usein Kysytyt Kysymyksemme, josta löydät vastauksia mm. matkatavaroihin, aikatauluihin, lippujen hintoihin ja varauksen peruuttamiseen tai muuttamiseen liittyen. Mikäli haluat käyttää EU:n tietosuoja-asetuksen mukaisia rekisteröidyn oikeuksiasi (esim. tehdä tarkastuspyynnön), voit tehdä sen osoitteessa privacy.finnair.com.

For many Bologna is still a bit of a hidden gem among the more popular Italian cities. Here are our top five reasons why you should go and discover its delights for yourself.
https://t.co/J59ESMUsQW

urls.title: Five reasons to choose Bologna
urls.description: For many Bologna is still a bit of a hidden gem among the more popular Italian cities. Here are our top five reasons why you should go and discover its delights for yourself. Bologna is one of the biggest foodie cities in Europe and for anyone interested in Italian cuisine a mind-blowing experience. To get a good first impression of the culinary delights you might want to join in on a food tour. The options are endless, from aperitivo tours to pasta demonstrations, food market visits to wine tasting

data.text: @christamangan @FinnairHelps Hi Christa, Finnair will check your baggage to the final destination marked in your ticket and you don't have to collect your baggage in Helsinki. data.text: Wondering what to do in Helsinki while on a layover in the city? We’ve got you covered. Make every minute of your stay in the Finnish capital count, whether you’ve got six, 12 or 24 hours to play with. https://t.co/0FS5n4DgI0
@radonco Hi, you don't need a transit visa if you don't leave the airport's transit area in Helsinki. Regards, Heidi / Finnair

The multi-city booking option is back! You can now make more complex bookings with us, and return from a different destination than where you flew to – or return to a different destination than where started your journey from. Read more: https://t.co/FTww9Y220B https://t.co/dr3CVe4m5G

urls.title: What is a multi-city booking?
urls.description: By selecting “Multi-city” as the trip type, you can book a round trip for different routes in each direction. For example, you can fly from Helsinki to Rome and return from Paris to Helsinki, the travel between Rome and Paris being arranged on your own by other means. You must return from the same continent you flew to and to the same continent you left from. For example, you can fly from E urope to Asia and back from Asia to Europe but not from Europe to Asia and then from Asia to North America. When

data.text: With our travel extras, you can add a little bit of luxury to your long-awaited holiday. Add extra comfort to your travel by selecting your seat, treat your taste buds with a pre-order meal or start your trip with style at one of our Finnair Lounges. https://t.co/aFR225IRMy

urls.title: Why not add a touch of luxury to your Finnair travel experience
urls.description: If you’re like most people, travelling for a holiday might be the highlight of the year for you. We’ve gathered five tips for you to enjoy your vacation to the fullest. With our travel extras you elevate your travel experience and make your journey to look like you. The easiest way to tailor your journey is with Finnair mobile app. In our Business Class you elevate your journey to the next level with maximum comfort, space and privacy, delicious meals with matching beverages and top-class service. The

urls.title: Palautteet ja korvaukset
urls.description: Meillä on tällä hetkellä ruuhkaa. Pahoittelemme pitkää vastausaikaa. Keskimääräinen käsittelyaikamme on neljä viikkoa. Kiitos kärsivällisyydestäsi. Otamme mielellämme vastaan palautetta ja autamme sinua korvaushakemuksissa ja muissa ongelmatilanteissa. Palautteesi on meille arvokasta ja se auttaa meitä palvelumme kehittämisessä. Yleisemmissä aiheissa pyydämme tutustumaan usein kysyttyihin kysymyksiimme tai kysymään apua chat-palvelumme

urls.title: Palautteet ja korvaukset
urls.description: Meillä on tällä hetkellä ruuhkaa. Pahoittelemme pitkää vastausaikaa. Keskimääräinen käsittelyaikamme on neljä viikkoa. Kiitos kärsivällisyydestäsi. Otamme mielellämme vastaan palautetta ja autamme sinua korvaushakemuksissa ja muissa ongelmatilanteissa. Palautteesi on meille arvokasta ja se auttaa meitä palvelumme kehittämisessä. Yleisemmissä aiheissa pyydämme tutustumaan usein kysyttyihin kysymyksiimme tai kysymään apua chat-palvelumme

data.text: @zdeluca Hi, thank you for your feedback. We are currently experiencing a backlog in our customer service. I am sorry for the delay and inconvenience. Thank you for your patience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@wilhelmstore Hei, oletkohan laittanut palautteesi täältä https://t.co/6bXibWBBtL vai jotain muuta kautta? Olen pahoillani viiveestä! Ystävällisin terveisin, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Palautteet ja korvaukset
urls.description: Meillä on tällä hetkellä ruuhkaa. Pahoittelemme pitkää vastausaikaa. Keskimääräinen käsittelyaikamme on neljä viikkoa. Kiitos kärsivällisyydestäsi. Otamme mielellämme vastaan palautetta ja autamme sinua korvaushakemuksissa ja muissa ongelmatilanteissa. Palautteesi on meille arvokasta ja se auttaa meitä palvelumme kehittämisessä. Yleisemmissä aiheissa pyydämme tutustumaan usein kysyttyihin kysymyksiimme tai kysymään apua chat-palvelumme

data.text: @Hermonini Thank you for your nice feedback. I am happy to hear you enjoyed it, welcome on board soon again! 💙 Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@nicksak Hi, you can read more about the USA travel requirements here https://t.co/gFcDo9W37x or on their official site. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Travel requirements map
urls.description: Use the interactive travel map to find out where you can fly with Finnair and what guidelines you need to follow in each destination.

data.text: @freshlybaked72 @FinnairHelps Hi, I apologise for the inconvenience! I hope you had a nice flight despite the delay. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@nabilkhan Hi, I am sincerely very sorry for this inconvenience! You should be able to track it from here: https://t.co/ItZ1e2nmLT if you have made a report of your delayed bag. Thank you for your patience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@LeenaTAsplund Hi, we don't have an office in DFW but you can contact our US customer service by calling them. Our customer service phone numbers are listed on this page: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@wiwigoo Hi Lili, I am sincerely and extremely sorry for this inconvenience! I hope you were able to reschedule your flights in the end? Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@359bertle Hi, I apologise for this inconvenience! Our passengers have the option to purchase a Finnair Cancellation Cover for sudden sickness: https://t.co/6qvCwUpPyA. We also offer more flexibility with our Flex and Classic ticket types: https://t.co/tL0xyfX7O9. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Finnair Cancellation Cover
urls.description: Finnair Cancellation Cover allows you to cancel your flight and apply for a refund in case you cannot travel due to sudden sickness or accident.

urls.title: Finnair ticket types
urls.description: Our ticket options available in Business, Premium Economy and Economy Class offer you the choice and flexibility you've been looking for.

data.text: @cussend27 Hi, I apologise for this inconvenience! Our passengers have the option to purchase a Finnair Cancellation Cover for sudden sickness: https://t.co/XnxMC5p8aj. We also offer more flexibility with our Flex and Classic ticket types: https://t.co/jjMJSjKZqi. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

data.text: @Grifflet25 Hi, our average refund handling time is currently 2-3 weeks. However, it can also be longer. I apologise for the inconvenience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@stephelizarob @Arlanda @FinnairHelps Hi, I am very sorry for this inconvenience! I hope you had an otherwise relaxing time above the clouds with us. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@Grifflet25 Hi, I am extremely sorry about your delayed baggage! You can track your bag through this link: https://t.co/ItZ1e2nmLT. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@Ossluo @FinnairHelps Hei Ossi, olen erittäin pahoillani tästä! Asiakaspalvelumme on edelleen valitettavan ruuhkainen. Voisitko ystävällisesti ottaa asiakaspalveluumme yhteyttä puhelimitse? Löydät yhteystiedot täältä: https://t.co/GtSKqN6bP1. Kiitos kärsivällisyydestäsi! -Ada/Finnair

@jamieriksson Hi, I am sorry for the unfortunate situation. Our customers can purchase a Finnair Cancellation Cover for a sudden sickness: https://t.co/XnxMC5p8aj. Also, our Flex and Classic tickets come with more flexibility: https://t.co/jjMJSjKZqi. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

data.text: @SebNoren Hi, I apologise for the inconvenience! JFK is a pretty busy airport and the take-off times can, unfortunately, be delayed sometimes. I hope you were able to make your connection and had a nice flight with us despite the delay. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

data.text: @Lohitpandey @FinnairHelps @SAS Hi, I am extremely sorry for the inconvenience! Has she already reported her bag here: https://t.co/ItZ1e2nmLT? Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

From today onwards, all flights at Helsinki Airport depart from one terminal, as T1 and T2 will be history. All Finnair departure hall services are easily available for you in the new Helsinki Airport departure hall. We wish you a smooth journey! https://t.co/pbtG4v5GH3 https://t.co/4HeXnFRL3U

urls.title: Smooth travelling at Helsinki Airport
urls.description: Flying via Helsinki means that you can enjoy the compact and uncrowded Helsinki Airport, where all the gates and services are located under one roof, in one terminal building. Helsinki Airport welcomes you with its new spacious arrival and departure halls! As the main transit area for Finnair customers, the brand-new terminal will make connections extra quick and smooth. Catching a train, bus or taxi to or from the airport is now easier than ever as everything is nearby the terminal entrance. The

data.text: Did you know that Finnish Archipelago has been described as the most beautiful archipelago in the world and that there are more islands and islets in the Archipelago Sea than anywhere else in the world? Check out our tips for three different destinations: https://t.co/ghU006uY8G https://t.co/mouK3Ru7oS

Did you know that you can now calculate and offset the carbon footprint from your flights with our service that combines Sustainable Aviation Fuel (SAF) and trusted climate projects? Join our journey toward carbon neutrality and read more: https://t.co/hFMR40evx1 https://t.co/7oJT2Hjp3g

urls.title: Finnair's carbon offset service
urls.description: Join us on our most important journey and offset your flight emissions.

data.text: We have a new, wonderful travel retail selection for both pre-order and onboard shopping including lots of novelties! The wide pre-order selection is available through Finnair Shop, and some 20 best-selling products are on sale on flights outside the EU: https://t.co/JxT15rqHnI https://t.co/fyyCVEhOKH

urls.title: Pre-order products
urls.description: Browse through some of our customer favorites and best-sellers available for purchase during your flight. Enlighten your holidays by pre-ordering trendy items from iconic sunglasses to refreshments. make the most out of your holidays! The delicious Fazer sweets and kids favorites are perfect to enjoy onboard, during the trip and as a souvenir. Long live design! Discover the best of iconic Finnish design with our hand-picked selection. Fill in your next flight details to add pre-order products to your

data.text: @jyrkiw Hei, kiitos palautteestasi. Varmaankin eksynyt joukkoon kirjoitusvirhe. Laitoin tämän eteenpäin. 🙂 Ystävällisin terveisin, Ada/Finnair

@dr_SunilP @FinnairHelps Hi, unfortunately, we currently have delays in our refund handling. We will inform you via email when your refund application has been processed. I apologise for the inconvenience and long wait! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

We calculated in 2018 that if every passenger that year had travelled with one kilogram less, the savings on fuel would have covered twenty flights between Helsinki and Tokyo. See our packing tips and pack only necessary items for your next trip: https://t.co/LQmDcQluVT

urls.title: Pack light – save fuel and make things easy on yourself!
urls.description: Packing light or travelling with only a cabin bag has many benefits, from easier travel to less climate emissions! With our clever tips, you can feel like a true packing pro. When thinking of sustainable travel, packing might not be the first thing you think about. But it is worth giving some thought. In 2018 we calculated that if every passenger that year had travelled with one kilogram less, the savings on fuel would have covered twenty flights between Helsinki and Tokyo. When you pack five kilos less,

domain.name: Cities
domain.description: Cities around the world

data.text: Dreaming about a relaxing and unforgettable summer vacation? In Finland, you can enjoy the iconic white nights, escape the usual hustle and bustle to a cosy summer house, relax in the sauna and cool down by dipping into the clear lakes. https://t.co/8xAk8qI5ha https://t.co/pLygRmiBVP

urls.title: Spend your summer holiday in Finland under the magical Midnight Sun
urls.description: Finland is a place where you can truly put your relaxation mode on. Finns are passionate about summer. The summer in Finland is short but the Finns really know how to make it as sweet as possible. It is impossible to say really, what is the best thing about the Finnish summer. Summer in Finland offers so many sweet treats and stunning surprises. White nights at a cosy Finnish summer house right by the water, relaxing baths at the sauna, skinny dipping in the clear lakes, magical moments in nature glowing

data.text: @panikupaniku @FinnairHelps Hi, I apologise for the inconvenience! I'm not aware of any general issues within our booking system. If you still weren't able to complete your booking, please contact our customer service: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@CunningQuestion @FinnairHelps Hi, all our Singapore flights are planned to have renewed cabins including Premium Economy Class. No exceptions are planned for this route. However, some ad-hoc changes are always possible due to, for example, technical reasons. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

Please note that using a face mask on our flights is optional unless required by your destination or origin authorities. Remember to check from our travel update, whether using a mask is still mandatory on your flight: https://t.co/AdJ6twvtM9 https://t.co/lpDFg6XXOI

urls.title: Facemask policy on our flights
urls.description: Wearing a mask on our flights is optional, unless it is required by the authorities of your destination or origin country. As coronavirus pandemic is moving to a new phase and coronavirus related restrictions are being removed across countries, we at Finnair are lifting the requirement to wear a face mask on board our flights. Wearing a mask on our flights is optional, unless it is required by the authorities of your destination or origin country. On flights where using a mask is an authority requirement,

data.text: Singapore has it all – more food options than you can imagine, entertainment to keep you busy, lots of green space to enjoy and endless shopping opportunities: https://t.co/p39N4R97ov. On our Singapore flights, you can enjoy our elevated long-haul experience. https://t.co/gvkuKUcKeI

urls.title: Sights, scents, and flavours in Singapore
urls.description: Singapore really has it all: some of the best shopping in the world, more food options than you can imagine, entertainment to keep you busy for years and lots of green space for relaxing. Open your senses and take it all in! Singapore's famous Hawker Centres, cooked food markets, are the place to go if you want to sample a variety of great quality local dishes - for a modest price tag. The most popular is Lau Pa Sat seating over 2000 people. The offering includes traditional dishes such as Hor Fun (a

data.text: @theliamhall Hi, the USA has just lifted the pre-test requirement, so a coronavirus test is no longer needed. You can check travel requirements from our map: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

data.text: @jett_fueled Hi, our first boarding groups include e.g. Business Class customers and the higher tier customers as well as families with small children, after that come other tier customers and Premium Economy, and then it depends where in the aircraft you are seated. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

Good news for travellers going to the USA! You are no longer required to take a pre-test before your trip. Vaccinations are still required to enter the USA. You can check travel requirements from our easy-to-use travel requirements map: https://t.co/gFcDo9W37x https://t.co/s2C0hpdUTy

data.text: @pirjo_liisa @FinnairSuomi @HelsinkiAirport @FijiAirways @thisisFINLAND Welcome on board again!✈️

Have you already had a chance to try our new signature cocktail, Northern Blush? With plenty of Finnish lingonberries, a splash of gin and a dash of orange peel – this fresh novelty is available on all our long-haul flights in all travel classes. https://t.co/ZfNAibcLMQ

urls.title: Finnair’s new signature cocktail inspired by the sunset takes off to the skies
urls.description: From 11 May onwards, you can enjoy our brand-new signature cocktail, created together with Danish Mikropolis Cocktails. Plenty of lingonberries, a splash of gin and a dash of orange peel bring you a whole new form of enjoyment on our long-haul flights. Sit back and relax, your long-haul flight is about to take off. Maybe admire the stunning view above the clouds, perhaps the beautiful sunset glowing in the shades of red, orange and yellow. Let us introduce you our new signature drink, Northern Blush,

data.text:
Ever heard of Oulu, the largest city in Northern Finland? Enjoy a unique time travel to the past by visiting the Oulu market square and escape the usual hustle and bustle in Hailuoto to face pristine nature and tranquillity.
